name: Global uniques
uniques: [-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [-5] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-10] Happiness>
May buy [Archeologist] units with [Gold] for [2] times their normal Production cost
Triggers a [A Place to Live] event <upon discovering [Vascular Plant] technology>
